content.rendered: “Wired input 80Mbps, wireless input 24Mbps 4ch 1080P decoding, Max 4 IPC input, H.265+/H.264+ 1HDD(Max 4TB), 1VGA&1HDMI, 2USB2.0, 1RJ45(100Mbps), 2 external antenna Cloud storage”
